attributes.action: Give the NHS the £350 million promised by Boris during the Brexit campaign
attributes.additional_details:
Because the NHS has been underfunded for years, all the NHS staff deserve better pay and more than the 3% offered by the government. Particularly after all the amazing work done during the pandemic, and how much the Government relied on them during this time.

Please hold this government accountable for the promises made during the Brexit campaign.
attributes.background: Give the NHS the £350 million that was promised during the Brexit campaign. It was stated that this money was taken by the EU and should be given the NHS, however, there has been no evidence of this being delivered.

rejection.details:
The Government has passed legislation which increases funding for the NHS by £33.9 billion a year (in cash terms) by 2023/24: https://services.parliament.uk/Bills/2019-21/nhsfunding.html

You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/nhs-funding-bill-enters-parliament.
